lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and coach Boris Becker are splitting up after three seasons — and a half-dozen Grand Slam titles — as a pair.
snippet: Novak Djokovic and coach Boris Becker are splitting up after three seasons — and a half-dozen Grand Slam titles — as a pair....

headline.main: Djokovic, Becker Splitting After 3 Seasons, 6 Major Titles
